short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension for creating timers in browser tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use of the extension is primarily through the use of the omnibox. To create a timer page enter `tid` followed by a duration or specific time. For instance `tid 10m`.
